backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining all core types (Report, Activity, UserProfile, etc.) and backend logic for a museum monthly reporting system, including storage, access control, and user approval mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting that transparency was removed from all dropdown/select overlay components by modifying `frontend/src/index.css`.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: A JSON-formatted text file containing short summaries of each frontend source file, serving as a build/planning reference for the frontend codebase.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining CSS custom properties (design tokens) for light and dark themes including colors, borders, sidebar, and chart variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React app titled 'Museus Centro – Relatório Mensal Individual 2026', mounting the app at `#root` and loading `src/main.tsx`.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that sets up TanStack Router with all application routes, authentication guard via Internet Identity, profile setup modal, pending approval screen, and a sidebar layout.
frontend/src/components/ActivitiesList.t: Component that displays a list of activities for a given report as cards with status/classification badges, audience info, and edit/add buttons based on user role and report ownership.
frontend/src/components/ApprovalDetailVi: Displays a detailed view of a report for review, allowing coordinators/admins to approve, reject, or request adjustments with optional comments and a signature canvas.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Activi: A bar chart component that visualizes activity counts per museum using Recharts, with truncated labels and color cycling.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Audien: Renders a pie chart breaking down audience by demographic profile (children, youth, adults, elderly, PCD) using Recharts, with a fallback message when no data is available.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/KPICar: A reusable card component for displaying a KPI metric with a title, value, optional icon, subtitle, and four visual variants (default, accent, success, warning).
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Monthl: Renders a line chart showing monthly audience evolution over time, sorting and labeling months in Portuguese using Recharts.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Planne: Renders a grouped bar chart comparing planned quantitative goals versus achieved results for goal-linked activities using Recharts.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Public: An interactive card that displays total general audience figures with selectable period modes (specific month, cumulative, or custom date range), fetching data via a query hook.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Report: Renders a bar chart showing report counts per month, sorted in calendar order with Portuguese month labels and a custom tooltip.
Renders a bar chart showing report counts per museum, truncating long museum names and displaying full names in a custom tooltip.
frontend/src/components/ExportConsolidat: Renders a button (visible only to admins) that exports all reports and activities as a consolidated CSV/Excel file using a utility generator.
frontend/src/components/ExportReportPDFB: A button component that triggers PDF generation for a single report and its associated activities.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Root layout component that renders the Sidebar alongside a main content area using TanStack Router's Outlet.
frontend/src/components/MonthYearSelecto: A pair of dropdowns for selecting a month and year, used to filter report data by time period.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: A modal dialog for first-time users to set their name and access role (professional, coordination, or administration) before using the app.
frontend/src/components/Sidebar.tsx: Navigation sidebar that displays role-filtered nav items, user profile info, and a logout button.
A canvas-based signature input component supporting mouse and touch drawing, with an imperative handle to retrieve the signature as a base64 string or clear it.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A React hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor using the current Internet Identity, initializing access control and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and hook, managing AuthClient creation, login/logout flow, identity persistence, and exposing login status states to child components.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for all backend actor interactions including user profiles, reports, activities, goals, and admin operations using @tanstack/react-query.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports fonts, configures Tailwind, defines CSS custom properties for light/dark themes using oklch colors, and ensures Radix UI overlays are fully opaque.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app wrapped in QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/ActivityFormPage.tsx: Form page for creating and editing activities, handling a large set of fields (audience, goals, partnerships, accessibility) with create/update mutations and pre-population from existing activity data.
frontend/src/pages/ApprovalsPage.tsx: Page for coordinators to view, filter, and manage report approvals, displaying a sortable list with search/status/month filters and a slide-out detail view.
frontend/src/pages/ConsolidatedMuseumPag: Page that aggregates reports and activities by museum, month, and year, displaying summary statistics and providing PDF/CSV export of consolidated data.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Renders a coordination dashboard with KPI cards, charts, and filters by museum/month, and provides an XLSX export of all reports and activities.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Displays the login screen for the Museus Centro system with an Internet Identity login button and branding.
frontend/src/pages/PendingApprovalPage.t: Shows a waiting screen for users whose accounts are pending coordinator approval, with options to resend the approval request or log out.
frontend/src/pages/ReportFormPage.tsx: Provides a form for creating or editing monthly reports, including fields for professional info, narrative sections, and a signature canvas, with save and submit actions.
frontend/src/pages/ReportsListPage.tsx: Lists the current user's monthly reports with status badges, expandable activity details, and actions for editing, deleting, adding activities, and exporting to PDF or Excel.
frontend/src/pages/UserManagementPage.ts: Admin page for managing user profiles, allowing coordinators to approve, reject, edit roles/museums, and delete users, with pending approvals highlighted.
frontend/src/utils/audienceValidation.ts: Exports a function that validates whether the sum of audience demographic profiles (children, youth, adults, elderly, PCD) does not exceed the declared total audience, returning a validation result object.
frontend/src/utils/consolidatedCsvGenera: Generates and downloads a consolidated CSV file from multiple reports and their associated activities, mapping enum values to Portuguese labels and formatting all fields into rows.
frontend/src/utils/consolidatedPdfGenera: Generates a consolidated PDF (via browser print) summarizing multiple reports and their activities, including aggregate totals for audience, activities, and hours, with Portuguese label mappings.
frontend/src/utils/excelGenerator.ts: Generates and downloads a CSV-formatted Excel export of multiple reports and their activities, using the same column structure and Portuguese label mappings as the consolidated CSV generator.
frontend/src/utils/labels.ts: Provides centralized helper functions and constants for converting backend enum values (MuseumLocation, Month, Status, ActivityStatus, Classification, etc.) to human-readable Portuguese labels.
frontend/src/utils/pdfGenerator.ts: Generates and opens a print-ready PDF for a single report and its activities, rendering report metadata and per-activity details as styled HTML with Portuguese label mappings.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with helpers to persist, retrieve, and clear those parameters via sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom theme tokens (colors via OKLCH variables, fonts, border radii, shadows, animations) and enabling the typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata tracking a fix request to remove transparency from all dropdown/select/popover overlay components across the frontend, ensuring fully opaque backgrounds.
